boardgame.name: Burano
Burano: Wyspa kolorów
彩色島
boardgame.description: Burano, also known as the lace island, is an island in the northern Venetian lagoon. Burano is extremely famous for its brightly colored houses, those square-shaped houses of a riot of colors along the water channels make it like a fairy tale land._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Fishing has been the main activity in Burano since its foundation. A story goes that while fishermen went a long-term fishing outside the lagoon, their wife who stayed and missed their husband took out needles and made lace like they mended their husband's fishing nets._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In the Middle Ages, Burano lace was highly admired and widely requested by royal families all over Europe. Players represent a family leader on this little island. They can send men to fish for the main source of income, or send women to lacemaking to sale abroad. Making a good living and making Burano become world famous, you have to figure out how to organize family members to their suitable work. It depends on you to earn the glory for your family and lead them to be outstanding from other families._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Burano is played over four seasons, 14 rounds altogether. Through the novel _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;cube pyramid-driven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; mechanism, players take turns paying coins to operate their cube pyramid during each round. The operation of the color-coded cubes would trigger certain actions, such as fishing, lace making, and house roofing, which will earn players victory points (VP). At the end of the game, whoever has earned the most VP wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Heavy Cardboard Episode 35 – Food Chain Magnate
The Game Pit Podcast: Episode 62 - LobSterCon XI Roundtable

listing.notes: Essen 2015. Near mint condition.
Played once, pristine condition.
For tcollet only
Essen copy, played one time.

Condition notes: There is a small 1/2 inch crease in the corner on the front page of the English rules. The game came with a very warped board, I was able to unwarp the board to be playable. I threw away the cardboard insert, everything is in bags. There are a good number of laminated aids included. If you pay by PayPal and don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t use the Friends and Family option, you will need to add 2.5% to the cost. I also accept Google Wallet. The game will ship via USPS Medium Flat Rate Box. The shipping to the US is $11.30.

Game has been played twice. All game components in excellent condition, cards sleeved for protection. Payment: Bank transfer to an EU bank account using IBAN/BIC in advance (free of charge) Paypal (add 3,- Euro to cover the fees. That should be the first choice for non-EU customers.) I will always ship insured (tracking number included): Germany: 5,89 (via Hermes) EU: 15,99€ (via DHL) Rest of the world: Please contact me before purchasing an item to clarify the shipping costs.
New In Shrink. Ships from the east coast (27518). Weight based shipping or Flat Rate box, whichever is cheapest for you.
